                              java.lang.String tag,
                              java.lang.String password,
                              Player player)
        Attempts to create a Faction with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        factionName - The String name of the Faction.
        tag - The String tag of the Faction.
        password - The administrator String password of the Faction.
        player - The Player creating the Faction.
        Returns:
        The Response result.

      • rejectInvites

        public Response rejectInvites(Player player,
                              Faction faction)
        Rejects and deletes FactionInvite invites for the Player. If null is passed on the Faction argument, then all invites that exist (if any), will be rejects and deleted.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player being affected.
        faction - The Faction being specified. If null is passed, all Faction invites will be processed.
        Returns:
        Returns a Response that details the result of the action.

      • kickFromFaction

        public Response kickFromFaction(Player playerOwner,
                                Player playerKick)
        Parameters:
        playerOwner - The Player owning the Faction.
        playerKick - The Player being kicked from the Faction.
        Returns:
        Returns a Response that details the result of the action.

      • changeFactionPassword

        public Response changeFactionPassword(Player player,
                                      java.lang.String passwordOriginal,
                                      java.lang.String passwordNew)
        Validates and changes the password for a Faction.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player. Will return as a failure if not the owner of a Faction.
        passwordOriginal - The original String password to validate the change.
        passwordNew - The new String password to set for the Faction.
        Returns:
        Returns a Response that details the result of the action.

      • changeFactionTag

        public Response changeFactionTag(Player player,
                                 java.lang.String tagNew)
        Validates and changes the tag for a Faction.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player. Will return as a failure if not the owner of a Faction.
        tagNew - The String tag to set for the Faction.
        Returns:
        Returns a Response that details the result of the action.

      • changeFactionName

        public Response changeFactionName(Player player,
                                  java.lang.String nameNew)
        Parameters:
        player - The Player. Will return as a failure if not the owner of a Faction.
        nameNew - The String name to set for the Faction.
        Returns:
        Returns a Response result. If all validations pass, Result.SUCCESS is passed.

      • changeFactionColor

        public Response changeFactionColor(Player player,
                                   java.lang.String colorNew)
        Parameters:
        player - The Player. Will return as a failure if not the owner of a Faction.
        colorNew - The String color to set for the Faction.
        Returns:
        Returns a Response result. If all validations pass, Result.SUCCESS is passed.

      • changeFactionOwner

        public Response changeFactionOwner(Player playerOwner,
                                   Player playerOwnerNew)
        Parameters:
        playerOwner - Will return as a failure if not the owner of a Faction.
        playerOwnerNew - The new owner to set for the Faction.
        Returns:
        Returns a Response result. If all validations pass, Result.SUCCESS is passed.
